content.raw:
Ug, this is going to make life difficult: http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/readdir_r.3.html

Apparently as of glibc 2.24, readdir(3) is now thread-safe, and thus readdir_r(3) is deprecated.  However, that is not true on earlier versions of glibc.  So we may have to do some version detection thing here to figure out which version to use, and I don't know what the case on other Unix (i.e. MacOS) is.  Would you mind opening a new issue about this, since it will require some investigation.  Thanks.
